sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Scilex Holding closes first tranche of $50 million loan agreement
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Co (NASDAQ:SCLX) announced it closed the first tranche of a $50 million loan agreement with The St. James Bank & Trust Company Ltd., receiving approximately $22.6 million. This follows recent strategic financial restructuring and leadership changes, including an amended loan agreement and a new chief operating officer.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Company Confirms Dream Bowl 2026 Meme Coin Claim Process on December 24, 2025 Drop by Datavault AI Inc.
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company confirmed the claim process for its Dream Bowl 2026 Meme Coin, which will be accessible to eligible shareholders from December 24, 2025. This meme coin, developed with Datavault AI's blockchain technology, integrates sports, digital assets, and shareholder benefits. Shareholders as of November 25, 2025, can claim their tokens via the designated website, representing an innovative approach to shareholder engagement.

feed.title: Scilex Holding closes first tranche of $50 million loan agreement By Investing.com
feed.summary: Scilex Holding (NASDAQ: SCLX) has closed the first tranche of a $50 million loan agreement with The St. James Bank & Trust Company Ltd., receiving approximately $22.6 million. This follows recent strategic financial restructurings, including an increased loan facility with St. James Bank & Trust and several leadership and operational changes. The company's common stock trades on The Nasdaq Stock Market LLC under the symbol SCLX.

feed.title: Scilex Holding closes first tranche of $50 million loan agreement
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Co (NASDAQ:SCLX) announced it has closed the first tranche of a $50 million loan agreement with The St. James Bank & Trust Company Ltd., receiving approximately $22.6 million. This follows recent strategic financial moves including increasing its loan facility to $100 million, repricing stock options, terminating an equity line of credit, and appointing a new chief operating officer. The company also secured a significant Bitcoin investment for Datavault AI.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Company Confirms Dream Bowl 2026 Meme Coin
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company (Nasdaq: SCLX) has confirmed the claim process for its Dream Bowl 2026 Meme Coin, which begins on December 24, 2025. This meme coin, powered by Datavault AI's blockchain technology, integrates sports, digital assets, and shareholder benefits. Eligible shareholders as of November 25, 2025, can claim their tokens through the designated website.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Co Closes First Tranche of $50M Loan Agreement
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Co (SCLX) has closed the first tranche of a $50 million loan agreement, amounting to approximately $22.6 million. The loan, provided by The St. James Bank & Trust Company Ltd., will be utilized for strategic financial initiatives. This information is based on an SEC filing from December 22, 2025.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Closes Second Tranche of Investment in Datavault AI
feed.summary: Scilex Holding has closed the second tranche of its investment in Datavault AI, a German-based AI company. This investment is part of a broader strategy to integrate advanced AI technologies across Scilex's pain management and neuroscience pipeline. The collaboration aims to leverage Datavault AI's proprietary technology for innovative drug discovery and development.

feed.title: Retail investors invested in Scilex Holding Company (NASDAQ:SCLX) copped the brunt of last week's US$12m market cap decline
feed.summary: Retail investors, holding 57% ownership, faced the biggest losses last week as Scilex Holding Company (NASDAQ:SCLX) experienced a US$12m market cap decline. While institutions hold 13% and Sclx Stock Acquisition Jv Llc is the largest shareholder with 24%, the significant retail ownership means they collectively have a major influence on management and business strategy. Insiders hold a smaller stake of US$5.5m in the US$101m company.

feed.title: Scilex Secures $100M Loan Facility Agreement
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company's subsidiary, SCLX Stock Acquisition JV LLC, has secured a loan facility of up to $100 million from The St. James Bank & Trust Company Ltd. The agreement, dated December 16, 2025, involves pledging a significant portion of Scilex's common stock as security and outlines terms for interest rates, maturity dates, and default conditions. Scilex (SCLX) operates in the pharmaceutical industry, focusing on non-opioid pain management therapies.

feed.title: Retail investors invested in Scilex Holding Company (NASDAQ:SCLX) copped the brunt of last week's US$12m market cap decline
feed.summary: Retail investors, who collectively hold 57% ownership in Scilex Holding Company (NASDAQ:SCLX), bore the brunt of a US$12 million market cap decline last week. While institutional investors hold a portion of the company's stock, private companies own 24%, and insiders hold a smaller stake, emphasizing the significant influence and risk exposure of individual investors. This substantial retail ownership means they have a greater say in management and business strategy, but also face the maximal upside or downside risk.

feed.title: Retail investors invested in Scilex Holding Company (NASDAQ:SCLX) copped the brunt of last week's US$12m market cap decline
feed.summary: Retail investors, holding 57% ownership, endured the largest losses during Scilex Holding Company's US$12m market cap decline last week. Despite significant retail and institutional ownership, no single entity possesses a majority interest, with the top 25 shareholders collectively owning less than 50% of the company. Insiders maintain a US$5.5m stake, signaling some alignment with shareholders.

feed.title: Scilex Holding increases loan agreement to $100 million, pledges more Datavault AI shares
feed.summary: Scilex Holding has expanded its loan agreement with The St. James Bank & Trust Company Ltd., increasing the principal from $50 million to $100 million. To secure this larger loan, Scilex has pledged more shares of Datavault AI Inc., raising the collateral from approximately 39.2 million to 85.8 million shares. This move follows other strategic developments, including a stock option repricing and a significant Bitcoin investment in Datavault AI.

feed.title: Scilex Holding increases loan agreement to $100 million, pledges more Datavault AI shares
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Co (NASDAQ:SCLX) has amended its loan agreement with The St. James Bank & Trust Company Ltd., increasing the principal to $100 million. As part of this amendment, Scilex has pledged a greater number of Datavault AI Inc. shares as collateral, rising from approximately 39.2 million to 85.8 million shares. This move follows other strategic developments for Scilex, including a stock option repricing, termination of an equity line of credit, and a significant Bitcoin investment in Datavault AI.

feed.title: Datavault AI Inc. (NASDAQ: DVLT) Announces a Distribution Date of Dec. 24, 2025, for the Dream Bowl Meme Coin Tokens to All Eligible Record Equity Holders of Datavault AI and Holders of Common Stock of Scilex Holding Company
feed.summary: Datavault AI Inc. (NASDAQ: DVLT) has set December 24, 2025, as the distribution date for its Dream Bowl 2026 Meme Coin tokens to eligible record equity holders and Scilex Holding Company (NASDAQ: SCLX) common stock holders. Recipients must open a digital wallet with Datavault AI and execute an Opt-In Agreement to receive the collectible Meme Coins, which are intended for entertainment and event access related to the Dream Bowl XIV. The Meme Coins will be tradeable on Datavault AI's Information Data Exchange starting around January 11, 2026, and may also be exported to other digital wallets.

feed.title: Scilex Holding shareholders approve repricing of employee stock options
feed.summary: Shareholders of Scilex Holding Company (NASDAQ:SCLX) have approved a one-time repricing of employee stock options, reducing the exercise price from $282.80 to $16.80 per share. This decision addresses significant stock volatility, including a recent 13.4% decline, while a 200.54% surge occurred over the past six months. This move, along with other recent corporate actions like terminating an equity line and investing in Datavault AI, highlights Scilex's dynamic strategic management.

feed.title: Datavault AI (NASDAQ: DVLT) to distribute Dream Bowl 2026 Meme Coins on Dec. 24, 2025
feed.summary: Datavault AI (NASDAQ: DVLT) has set December 24, 2025, as the distribution date for the Dream Bowl 2026 Meme Coin token to eligible record equity holders of Datavault AI and common stock holders of Scilex (NASDAQ: SCLX). Instructions for digital wallet setup and an Opt-In Agreement will be mailed around December 12, 2025, with trading expected to commence on Datavault's Information Data Exchange around January 11, 2026. The Meme Coin is a digital collectible for Dream Bowl XIV and is not intended as an investment or financial product.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Company's (NASDAQ:SCLX) top owners are retail investors with 57% stake, while 24% is held by private companies
feed.summary: In Scilex Holding Company (NASDAQ:SCLX), retail investors hold the largest share at 57%, indicating their significant influence over key decisions, while private companies own 24%. Institutional investors collectively hold 13% of the company's stock, suggesting analyst interest. No single dominant shareholder exists, with the top 25 individual shareholders collectively controlling less than half of the company's shares.

feed.title: Further Upside For Scilex Holding Company (NASDAQ:SCLX) Shares Could Introduce Price Risks After 26% Bounce
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company (NASDAQ:SCLX) has seen its share price rebound by 26% in the last thirty days, yet it remains down 30% over the past year. Despite a low price-to-sales (P/S) ratio of 2.5x compared to an industry average of over 4x, suggesting potential undervaluation, declining revenue and investor skepticism about future growth forecasts are contributing to the current valuation. Analyst predictions, however, anticipate a significant revenue climb of 145% per year over the next three years, significantly outpacing the industry's projected 29% growth.

feed.title: Scilex (NASDAQ: SCLX) completes Datavault AI investment for 263M shares, $583M
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company (NASDAQ: SCLX) has completed the second tranche of its strategic investment in Datavault AI (NASDAQ: DVLT). This involved purchasing and exercising a pre-funded warrant for 263,914,094 shares of Datavault common stock, valued at approximately $583.3 million based on Datavault's closing price on November 25, 2025. Both companies plan to collaborate on Real World Asset tokenization starting in 2026.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Company Announces Closing of Previously Announced Second Tranche Investment in Datavault AI Inc., Completing Its Two-Tranche Equity Financing in Datavault AI Inc.
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company (Nasdaq: SCLX) has announced the closure of the second tranche of its strategic investment in Datavault AI Inc. (Nasdaq: DVLT), completing its two-tranche equity financing. This involved purchasing a pre-funded warrant for 263,914,094 shares of Datavault AI common stock, valued at approximately $583.3 million. Both companies plan to increase collaboration in Real World Asset tokenization in 2026 and beyond.

feed.title: Datavault AI Announces Closing of the Second Tranche of Scilex Holding Company’s Previously Announced Equity Financing
feed.summary: Datavault AI has closed the second tranche of its equity financing with Scilex Holding Company, issuing a pre-funded warrant for over 263 million shares in exchange for approximately 1,237.6 Bitcoin. This follows stockholder approval and an initial tranche of approximately $8 million in Bitcoin. The strategic investment aims to strengthen Datavault AI's digital asset reserves, accelerate supercomputing infrastructure, and expand its platform, while the companies also advance their AI collaboration, granting Scilex an exclusive license for biotech applications.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Company Announces Closing of Exercise of Warrants for $20.3 Million Gross Proceeds
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company (Nasdaq: SCLX) announced the closing of a previously announced exercise of existing warrants, generating approximately $20.3 million in gross proceeds. This exercise involved 428,572 shares from April 2024 warrants and 475,824 shares from December 2024 warrants, both at a reduced exercise price of $22.51 per share. In exchange, the company issued a new unregistered warrant to purchase up to 1,356,594 shares of common stock at an exercise price of $29.00 per share, with net proceeds to be used for working capital and general corporate purposes.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Company Closes Exercise of Existing Warrants, Raising Approximately $20.3 Million in Gross Proceeds
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company announced the closing of existing warrant exercises, generating approximately $20.3 million in gross proceeds. These funds will be used for working capital and general corporate purposes, focusing on non-opioid pain management products. In exchange, Scilex issued new unregistered warrants to purchase additional shares, valid for five years.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Company Announces Exercise of Warrants for $20.3 Million Gross Proceeds
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company announced the exercise of existing warrants for approximately $20.3 million in gross proceeds. This transaction involves the issuance of new unregistered warrants to purchase up to 1,356,594 shares of Common Stock at an exercise price of $29.00 per share, with the proceeds intended for working capital and general corporate purposes. Rodman & Renshaw LLC and StockBlock Securities LLC acted as placement agents for the offering.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Company Announces Closing of Exercise of Warrants for $20.3 Million Gross Proceeds
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company announced the closing of an exercise of existing warrants, generating approximately $20.3 million in gross proceeds. The company issued new unregistered warrants to purchase up to 1,356,594 shares of Common Stock at an exercise price of $29.00 per share, with net proceeds from the offering intended for working capital and general corporate purposes. The new warrants and underlying shares are not registered under the Securities Act, with Scilex agreeing to file a registration statement for their resale.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Company Announces Update Regarding
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company announced an update concerning Datavault AI Inc.'s voluntary distribution of Dream Bowl 2026 Meme Coins. Nasdaq will not issue an announcement for Scilex regarding this distribution, but Datavault AI intends to proceed with the distribution to Scilex common stock record holders as of November 25, 2025. Recipients must opt-in and set up a digital wallet with Datavault AI to receive the airdropped meme coins.

feed.title: When Can We Expect A Profit From Scilex Holding Company (NASDAQ:SCLX)?
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company (NASDAQ:SCLX), a non-opioid pain management company, is projected by analysts to break even and turn a profit of US$137m in 2026, after reporting a US$123m loss in the trailing twelve months. This forecast implies an optimistic annual growth rate of 56%. The company currently has negative equity, which is noted as a potential concern.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Company Announces Worldwide Exclusive License for Tokenization and Monetization of Real-World Asset (RWA) in Genomic, DNA Data, Diagnosis, Therapeutics Products, Genetic and Drug information from Datavault AI
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company has secured a worldwide exclusive license from Datavault AI for its AI-driven technology, enabling the tokenization and monetization of real-world assets in the biotech and biopharma industry. This agreement allows Scilex to establish a Biotech Exchange platform for genomic and drug data and envisions expanding into a Pharmaceutical Exchange, potentially revolutionizing the industry by offering non-dilutive funding avenues. The license involves upfront and milestone payments, leveraging Datavault AI's patented technologies for secure data handling and asset tokenization.

feed.title: Datavault AI (DVLT) Stock Skyrockets on Bitcoin Deal & AI Hype – Is the 400% Rally Sustainable? - ts2.tech
feed.summary: Datavault AI (DVLT) has experienced a 400% stock rally driven by a $150 million Bitcoin investment from Scilex Holding and AI hype, alongside a planned acquisition of NYIAX Inc. and partnerships with IBM. While analysts are divided, with some seeing significant upside due to strategic deals and capital infusion, others warn of high volatility, substantial dilution risk from the Bitcoin deal, and the stock being significantly overvalued relative to its minimal revenue and institutional holdings. The sustainability of this rally hinges on forthcoming Q3 earnings, shareholder approval of the Bitcoin tranche, and the successful launch and monetization of new data exchanges.

feed.title: Semnur Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (“Semnur”), a Majority-Owned Subsidiary of Scilex Holding Company (Nasdaq: SCLX, “Scilex”), and Denali Capital Acquisition Corp. Announce the Closing of Their Previously Announced Business Combination
feed.summary: Semnur Pharmaceuticals, Inc., a subsidiary of Scilex Holding Company, and Denali Capital Acquisition Corp. have announced the closing of their previously disclosed business combination. The combined entity will continue as Semnur Pharmaceuticals, Inc., with its shares and warrants trading on the OTC Markets under "SMNR" and "SMNRW," respectively. Scilex will retain approximately 87.5% ownership post-combination, aiming to leverage public markets for growth in non-opioid pain management.

feed.title: Semnur Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (“Semnur”), a Majority-Owned Subsidiary of Scilex Holding Company (Nasdaq: SCLX, “Scilex”), and Denali Capital Acquisition Corp. Announce the Closing of Their Previously Announced Business Combination
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company announced that its majority-owned subsidiary, Semnur Pharmaceuticals, Inc., and Denali Capital Acquisition Corp. have closed their business combination. The combined entity will operate as Semnur Pharmaceuticals, Inc., with its shares and warrants continuing to trade on the OTC Markets under "SMNR" and "SMNRW." Scilex retains approximately 87.5% ownership of Semnur post-combination, aiming to leverage public capital markets for growth in non-opioid pain management.

feed.title: NeuroBiogen Company and Scilex Bio, a Controlling Interest
feed.summary: NeuroBiogen Company and Scilex Bio, a controlling interest of a joint venture by Scilex Holding Company, have signed a binding term sheet for a worldwide license to KDS2010. This agreement includes rights to sublicense and a collaboration for the development and commercialization of the novel oral tablet KDS2010, targeting cardiometabolic and neurodegenerative diseases with ongoing Phase 2 trials in obesity and Alzheimer’s disease. The collaboration leverages NeuroBiogen’s research and Scilex’s expertise in CNS and primary care diseases, aiming for the fast-growing weight loss and Alzheimer's disease markets.

feed.title: Private companies who have a significant stake must be disappointed along with institutions after Scilex Holding Company's (NASDAQ:SCLX) market cap dropped by US$22m
feed.summary: Private companies and institutions are likely disappointed after Scilex Holding Company's (NASDAQ:SCLX) market cap decreased by US$22 million following a 17% stock price drop. Private companies hold a 46% ownership stake, making them the largest shareholder group, followed by institutions with 22%. The article details the ownership breakdown and briefly touches on insider activity.

feed.title: Scilex Holding looks to separate Scilex Pharma through potential spinout, IPO
feed.summary: Scilex Holding is exploring options to unlock the value of its subsidiary, Scilex Pharma, through a potential spinout, public listing, or strategic transaction. This move follows Scilex Holding's belief that Scilex Pharma's value exceeds that of its parent company, with projections for its lead products, ZTildo and a triple-strength formulation, expected to generate significant sales. Scilex Holding recently successfully spun out another subsidiary, Semnur Pharmaceuticals, through a merger with a SPAC.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Company Announces that its Board of Directors has Authorized Management to Explore Ways to Maximize the Value of its Wholly Owned Subsidiary, Scilex Pharmaceuticals Inc., including by way of conducting a spinoff or public listing of securities of Scilex Pharmaceuticals Inc.
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company announced that its Board of Directors has authorized management to explore options to maximize the value of its wholly-owned subsidiary, Scilex Pharmaceuticals Inc., potentially through a spinoff or public listing of securities. The company believes Scilex Pharma's value might exceed its parent company's current valuation, especially given its portfolio of three FDA-approved commercial non-opioid products and a promising pipeline including SP-103 with a projected $1.2 billion annual peak sales potential. This strategic move aims to unlock the substantial potential value of Scilex Pharma for its stockholders.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Company Announces that the U.S. Bankruptcy Court has Extended the Lockup Period on Shares of Scilex Dividend Stock Previously Distributed by Sorrento to its Stockholders as a Dividend to January 31, 2025
feed.summary: The U.S. Bankruptcy Court has extended the lock-up period for Scilex Dividend Stock, previously distributed by Sorrento Therapeutics, to January 31, 2025. This extension applies only to the Dividend Stock, preventing its sale or transfer until the new expiration date. Scilex noted that its transfer agent, Continental Stock Transfer & Trust Company, has been informed of this decision.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Company Rings the Closing Bell
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company, a developer and commercializer of non-opioid pain management products, visited the Nasdaq MarketSite in Times Square. Jaisim Shah, CEO and President, rang the Closing Bell to commemorate the occasion. The event took place on July 5, 2024, from 3:45 PM to 4:15 PM ET.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Company, a majority-owned subsidiary of
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company, a majority-owned subsidiary of Sorrento Therapeutics, Inc., announced the closing of its business combination with Vickers Vantage Corp. I. The combined company will operate as Scilex Holding Company, with its shares and warrants expected to begin trading on the Nasdaq Capital Market under ticker symbols “SCLX” and “SCLXW” on November 11, 2022. This move is aimed at enhancing business growth and expanding access to Scilex's non-opioid pain management products.
